description:
This resource provides a alarm rule resource and it can be used to monitor several cloud services according different metrics.
Details for [alarm rule](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/28608.htm).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ContactGroups.description: List contact groups of the alarm rule, which must have been created on the console.

Dimensions.description: Map of the resources associated with the alarm rule, such as "instanceId", "device" and "port". Each key's value is a string and it uses comma to split multiple items. For more information, see [Metrics Reference](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/28619.htm).

EffectiveInterval.description: The interval of effecting alarm rule. It foramt as "hh:mm-hh:mm", like "0:00-4:00". Default to "00:00-23:59".

Enabled.description: Whether to enable alarm rule. Default to true.

EndTime.description: It has been deprecated from provider version 1.50.0 and 'effective_interval' instead.

Metric.description: Name of the monitoring metrics corresponding to a project, such as "CPUUtilization" and "networkin_rate". For more information, see [Metrics Reference](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/28619.htm).

NotifyType.description: Notification type. Valid value [0, 1]. The value 0 indicates TradeManager+email, and the value 1 indicates that TradeManager+email+SMS.

Operator.description: Alarm comparison operator. Valid values: ["<=", "<", ">", ">=", "==", "!="]. Default to "==".

Period.description: Index query cycle, which must be consistent with that defined for metrics. Default to 300, in seconds.

Project.description: Monitor project name, such as "acs_ecs_dashboard" and "acs_rds_dashboard". For more information, see [Metrics Reference](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/28619.htm).

SilenceTime.description: Notification silence period in the alarm state, in seconds. Valid value range: [300, 86400]. Default to 86400.

StartTime.description: It has been deprecated from provider version 1.50.0 and 'effective_interval' instead.

Statistics.description: Statistical method. It must be consistent with that defined for metrics. Valid values: ["Average", "Minimum", "Maximum"]. Default to "Average".

Threshold.description: Alarm threshold value, which must be a numeric value currently.

TriggeredCount.description: Number of consecutive times it has been detected that the values exceed the threshold. Default to 3.

Webhook.description: The webhook that should be called when the alarm is triggered. Currently, only http protocol is supported. Default is empty string.
